name: dihydrokaempferol,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (3'-hydroxylating)
definition: Dihydrokaempferol + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Taxifolin + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: first step of two-step reaction (see R03125, R03124+R03639) subsequently R03639, catalyzed by flavonoid 3',5'-hydroxylase (ec 1.14.13.88)
